text: Plants are food. #Cannabis is a plant. #Food is medicine from #God ~  #AndThatsWhenItAllHitMe my #Church had lied to me for 70 years ~ #God wants you to know smoke the Joint it's fine but you need to eat the Plant to prevent #Cancer and other #Cannabinoid Deficiency Disorders ~ https://t.co/Qb0i5sL8YM
